ModMetaData.name: [FSF] Advanced Bionics Expansion (No Royalty)
ModMetaData.author: FrozenSnowFox | Dr_Zhivago
ModMetaData.description: <size=24>Version</size> = 1.2.1.0 Adds in all the missing vanilla bionics. Also adds a new series of Advanced Bionics and makes Archotech Bionics much more powerful. Edited Royalty dependency out by Dr_Zhivago.
